Supreme priest [Prana]: Leave at the point of *[Ruiny] Of [esagira]*. There you will find the researcher of *[Raksisa]*. I want so that you would help it. By the way, try to immediately move to the ruins Of [esagira]. In order to make this, you will be turned down *[Khranitelyu] of the portal Of [raykelyu]*. You will find it in rural fountain.
